Show evidence severe hyponatremia ( Sodium [ Na ] < 120 millimoles per liter [ mmol/L ] ) Show presence hepatocellular carcinoma Have portal shunt Show evidence severe ascites Have hemoglobin < 9.0 gram per deciliter ( g/dL ) Have platelet count < 40 x 10^9 cell per liter ( cells/L ) Have total serum bilirubin > 15 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) Use medication know interfere hepatic metabolism ( , barbiturates , phenothiazine ) know alter major organ system Mild , Hepatic Impaired Participants ( ChildPugh A ) Show evidence active renal disease creatinine clearance < 70 mL/min calculate CockcroftGault equation .
